statements: SELECT * FROM driver_behavior WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT driver_id, driving_speed FROM driver_behavior WHERE driving_speed > 50;
SELECT * FROM driver_behavior WHERE acceleration < 0.5;
SELECT driver_id, driving_speed, acceleration FROM driver_behavior WHERE hard_braking = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM driver_behavior ORDER BY driving_speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM driver_behavior WHERE driving_speed > 60 ORDER BY driving_speed ASC, acceleration DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT driver_id, driving_speed, acceleration FROM driver_behavior WHERE hard_braking = true ORDER BY driving_speed DESC, acceleration ASC;
SELECT driver_id, acceleration FROM driver_behavior WHERE driving_speed BETWEEN 50 AND 70 AND hard_braking = false ORDER BY acceleration DESC, driving_speed ASC;
SELECT * FROM driver_behavior WHERE hard_braking = false AND driving_speed < 50 OR acceleration >= 1.5 ORDER BY driving_speed ASC, acceleration DESC;
SELECT driver_id, driving_speed, acceleration, hard_braking FROM driver_behavior WHERE driving_speed > 80 AND acceleration < 2.0 ORDER BY driver_id ASC, acceleration ASC;
SELECT * FROM driver_behavior;
SELECT driver_id, speeding_events FROM driver_behavior WHERE speeding_events > 10;
SELECT driver_id, harsh_braking_events FROM driver_behavior ORDER BY harsh_braking_events DESC;
SELECT * FROM safety_metrics WHERE seatbelt_usage = TRUE;
SELECT driver_id, airbag_deployments FROM safety_metrics WHERE airbag_deployments >= 3;
SELECT driver_id, speeding_events, harsh_braking_events FROM driver_behavior WHERE speeding_events > 10
SELECT driver_id, harsh_acceleration_events FROM driver_behavior WHERE harsh_acceleration_events >= 5 ORDER BY driver_id DESC
SELECT * FROM safety_metrics WHERE seatbelt_usage = TRUE AND airbag_deployments > 0
SELECT driver_id, harsh_braking_events FROM driver_behavior WHERE harsh_braking_events BETWEEN 3 AND 7
SELECT driver_id, SUM(speeding_events) AS total_speeding_events FROM driver_behavior GROUP BY driver_id HAVING total_speeding_events > 20
SELECT driver_name, driver_age FROM driver_data
SELECT * FROM driving_history WHERE speeding_violations > 0
SELECT driver_name, trip_start, trip_end FROM driver_data JOIN driving_history ON driver_data.driver_id = driving_history.driver_id
SELECT driver_name, safe_driving_score FROM driver_data JOIN safety_metrics ON driver_data.driver_id = safety_metrics.driver_id
SELECT driver_id, SUM(distance_traveled) AS total_distance FROM driving_history GROUP BY driver_id
SELECT * FROM driver_data WHERE driver_age > 30;
SELECT driver_name, license_plate FROM driver_data WHERE driver_age < 25;
SELECT driver_name, trip_start, trip_end FROM driver_data JOIN driving_history ON driver_data.driver_id = driving_history.driver_id;
SELECT driver_name, trip_start, distance_traveled FROM driver_data JOIN driving_history ON driver_data.driver_id = driving_history.driver_id WHERE distance_traveled > 100;
SELECT driver_name, safe_driving_score, accident_count FROM driver_data JOIN safety_metrics ON driver_data.driver_id = safety_metrics.driver_id WHERE safe_driving_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM driver_metrics;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name, total_trips FROM safety_metrics WHERE total_violations > 5;
SELECT driver_name, total_distance FROM driver_metrics ORDER BY total_distance DESC;
SELECT driver_id, trip_distance, trip_duration FROM trip_data WHERE trip_distance > 100 AND trip_duration < 60;
SELECT driver_id, status, last_updated FROM driver_status WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT driver_name, total_distance, total_trips FROM driver_metrics WHERE total_trips > 50 ORDER BY total_distance DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT driver_name, total_accidents, total_violations, safety_rating FROM safety_metrics ORDER BY safety_rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT driver_name, total_distance, average_speed FROM driver_metrics WHERE average_speed > 70 ORDER BY total_distance DESC;
SELECT trip_id, trip_distance, trip_duration, start_location, end_location FROM trip_data WHERE trip_duration > 2.5 ORDER BY trip_distance DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT driver_id, status, last_updated FROM driver_status WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM driver_info
SELECT driver_id, driver_name, phone_number FROM driver_info WHERE driver_license IS NOT NULL
SELECT trip_id, trip_date, trip_distance FROM trip_info ORDER BY trip_date DESC
SELECT driver_id, speeding, reckless_driving, distracted_driving FROM driving_behavior WHERE seatbelt_usage = FALSE
SELECT driver_id, safety_rating, violation_count FROM driver_safety_scores WHERE safety_rating >= 4
SELECT * FROM driver_info WHERE driver_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT driver_name, address, phone_number FROM driver_info ORDER BY driver_id DESC;
SELECT driver_name, COUNT(*) AS trip_count FROM trip_info JOIN driver_info ON trip_info.driver_id = driver_info.driver_id GROUP BY driver_name HAVING trip_count > 5;
SELECT driver_name, SUM(trip_distance) AS total_distance FROM trip_info JOIN driver_info ON trip_info.driver_id = driver_info.driver_id GROUP BY driver_name ORDER BY total_distance DESC;

SELECT d.driver_name, s.safety_rating, v.make, v.model FROM driver_safety_scores s JOIN driver_info d ON s.driver_id = d.driver_id JOIN vehicle_info v ON d.driver_id = v.driver_id WHERE s.safety_rating < 4 AND v.year > 2010;
